entries.lord1: That student was only one in a series of recent insurgents.  I know the professor has been putting them up to this... disobedient behavior.  I want to eliminate the man, immediately.  He has planned a field trip for his rebellious students.  Go there now and put an end to their criminal ways.
entries.lord3: Do not test my patience.  Speak to me as soon as you are fit for service, then.
